1.desc: Friendly fire is enabled for both survivors and monsters alike.
1.name: Artifact of Chaos

10.desc: Monsters will be of only one type per stage.
10.name: Artifact of Kin

11.desc: Players always spawn as a random survivor.
11.name: Artifact of Metamorphosis

12.desc: Monsters drop items on death, but Chests no longer spawn.
12.name: Artifact of Sacrifice

14.desc: Enemies drop multiple exploding bombs on death.
14.name: Artifact of Spite

15.desc: Monster spawns are doubled, but monster maximum health is halved.
15.name: Artifact of Swarms

16.desc: Your relentless doppelganger will invade every 10 minutes.
16.name: Artifact of Vengeance

3.desc: When one player dies, everyone dies. Enable only if you want to truly put your teamwork and individual skill to the ultimate test.
3.name: Artifact of Death

4.desc: Monsters can appear outside their usual environments.
4.name: Artifact of Dissonance

5.desc: Spawn with a random equipment that changes every time it's activated.
5.name: Artifact of Enigma

7.desc: Fall damage is doubled and lethal.
7.name: Artifact of Frailty

8.desc: Allies deal 500% damage, but have 10% health.
8.name: Artifact of Glass

9.desc: Enemies can only spawn as elites.
9.name: Artifact of Honor

1.desc: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.
1.name: Disposable Missile Launcher

10.desc: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.
10.name: The Crowdfunder
10.quote: Toggle to fire. Costs gold per bullet.

11.desc: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.
11.name: Gnarled Woodsprite
11.quote: Heal over time. Activate to send to an ally.

18.desc: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.
18.name: Helfire Tincture
18.quote: Burn everything nearby... including you and allies.

19.desc: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.
19.name: Radar Scanner

2.desc: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.
2.name: Foreign Fruit

20.desc: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5.
20.name: Effigy of Grief
20.quote: Drop a permanent effigy that cripples ALL characters inside. Can place up to 5.

21.desc: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
21.name: Eccentric Vase
21.quote: Create a quantum tunnel between two locations.

22.desc: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.\nWhen the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).
22.name: Spinel Tonic
22.quote: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats. Chance to gain an affliction that reduces ALL stats.

23.desc: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...
23.name: Fuel Array
23.quote: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...

24.desc: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.
24.name: Blast Shower

25.desc: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.
25.name: Volcanic Egg
25.quote: Transform into a speeding draconic fireball, dealing damage as you pass through enemies.

27.desc: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back.
27.name: Sawmerang
27.quote: Throw a fan of buzzing saws that come back to you.

28.desc: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.
28.name: Recycler
28.quote: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only recycle once.

29.desc: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.
29.name: Super Massive Leech
29.quote: Heal for a percentage of the damage you deal for 8 seconds.

3.desc: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.
3.name: Glowing Meteorite
3.quote: Rain meteors from the sky, hurting both enemies and allies.

30.desc: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
30.name: Gorag's Opus
30.quote: You and all your allies enter a frenzy.

31.desc: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.
31.name: Forgive Me Please
31.quote: Throw a cursed doll that repeatedly triggers your 'On Kill' effects.

4.desc: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds
4.name: Primordial Cube
4.quote: Fire a black hole that draws enemies in.

5.desc: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
5.name: Ocular HUD
5.quote: Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

6.desc: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.
6.name: The Back-up
6.quote: Call drones for back up. Lasts 25 seconds.

7.desc: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.
7.name: Preon Accumulator
7.quote: Fire a ball of energy that electrocutes nearby enemies before detonating.

8.desc: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.
8.name: Milky Chrysalis

9.desc: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.
9.name: Royal Capacitor
9.quote: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster.

1.desc: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.
1.name: 57 Leaf Clover

10.desc: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).
10.name: Paul's Goat Hoof

100.desc: 10% chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.
100.name: Charged Perforator
100.quote: Chance on hit to call down a lightning strike.

101.desc: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.
101.name: Shatterspleen
101.quote: Critical strikes always bleed enemies. Bleeding enemies now explode.

102.desc: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar}], and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.
102.name: Mired Urn
102.quote: Siphon health from nearby enemies while in combat.

103.desc: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.
103.name: Defiant Gouge
103.quote: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby.

104.desc: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack)}], causing them to deal +50% damage.
104.name: Mercurial Rachis
104.quote: Randomly create a Ward of Power. ALL characters deal bonus damage while in the Ward.

105.desc: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.
105.name: Defensive Microbots
105.quote: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

106.desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
106.name: Item Scrap, White
106.quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

107.desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
107.name: Item Scrap, Green
107.quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

108.desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
108.name: Item Scrap, Red
108.quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

109.desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
109.name: Item Scrap, Yellow
109.quote: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

11.desc: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.
11.name: Hopoo Feather

110.desc: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.
110.name: Purity
110.quote: Reduce your skill cooldowns by 2 seconds. You are unlucky.

111.desc: Replace your Secondary Skill  with Slicing Maelstrom.\nCharge up a projectile that deals 175% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.
111.name: Hooks of Heresy
111.quote: Replace your Secondary Skill with 'Slicing Maelstrom'.

112.desc: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.
112.name: Empathy Cores
112.quote: Recruit a pair of Solus Probes that gain power with more allies.

113.desc: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).
113.name: Planula

114.desc: Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.\nDealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
114.name: Essence of Heresy

12.desc: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).
12.name: Ukulele

13.desc: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.
13.name: Leeching Seed

14.desc: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill}], increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).
14.name: Frost Relic
14.quote: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.

15.desc: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).
15.name: Happiest Mask
15.quote: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.

16.desc: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).
16.name: Bustling Fungus
16.quote: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 1 second.

17.desc: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.
17.name: Crowbar
17.quote: Deal bonus damage to enemies above 90% health.

18.desc: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.
18.name: Predatory Instincts
18.quote: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.

19.desc: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.
19.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
19.quote: Chance to bleed enemies on hit.

2.desc: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).
2.name: Soldier's Syringe

20.desc: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).
20.name: Red Whip

21.desc: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.
21.name: H3AD-5T v2
21.quote: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.

22.desc: On level up or starting the Teleporter event}], drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.
22.name: Warbanner
22.quote: Drop a Warbanner on level up or starting the Teleporter event. Grants allies attack and movement speed.

23.desc: Killing 3 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
23.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
23.quote: Enter a frenzy after killing 3 enemies in quick succession.

24.desc: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).
24.name: Old War Stealthkit

25.desc: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.
25.name: Harvester's Scythe

26.desc: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.
26.name: Cautious Slug

27.desc: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).
27.name: Wax Quail
27.quote: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.

28.desc: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.
28.name: Personal Shield Generator

29.desc: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
29.name: N'kuhana's Opinion

3.desc: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.
3.name: Tougher Times

30.desc: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.
30.name: Medkit
30.quote: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.

31.desc: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).
31.name: Fuel Cell
31.quote: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.

32.desc: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack)}], up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.
32.name: Infusion
32.quote: Killing an enemy permanently increases your maximum health, up to 100.

33.desc: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.
33.name: Unstable Tesla Coil
33.quote: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.

34.desc: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.
34.name: Gasoline
34.quote: Killing enemies sets nearby enemies on fire.

37.desc: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
37.name: Sentient Meat Hook
37.quote: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.

38.desc: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
38.name: Bundle of Fireworks
38.quote: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.

39.desc: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
39.name: Bandolier
39.quote: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

4.desc: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+1.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.
4.name: Brilliant Behemoth

40.desc: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.
40.name: Stun Grenade

41.desc: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).
41.name: Shaped Glass
41.quote: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.

42.desc: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time.\nLose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.
42.name: Brittle Crown
42.quote: Gain gold on hit... BUT lose gold on getting hit.

43.desc: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.
43.name: Transcendence
43.quote: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.

44.desc: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).
44.name: Alien Head

45.desc: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).
45.name: Soulbound Catalyst

46.desc: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).
46.name: Titanic Knurl

47.desc: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.
47.name: Queen's Gland

5.desc: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.
5.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1

51.desc: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).
51.name: Energy Drink

52.desc: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.
52.name: Backup Magazine
52.quote: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

53.desc: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.
53.name: Sticky Bomb
53.quote: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.

54.desc: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.
54.name: Rusted Key
54.quote: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains a powerful item.

55.desc: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.
55.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

56.desc: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.
56.name: Rose Buckler

57.desc: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.
57.name: Runald's Band
57.quote: High damage hits also blasts enemies with runic ice. Recharges over time.

58.desc: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado}], dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.
58.name: Kjaro's Band
58.quote: High damage hits also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado. Recharges over time.

59.desc: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).
59.name: Chronobauble

6.desc: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.
6.name: Will-o'-the-wisp

60.desc: Upon death}], this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.
60.name: Dio's Best Friend

61.desc: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.
61.name: Hardlight Afterburner
61.quote: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.

62.desc: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).
62.name: Wake of Vultures
62.quote: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.

63.desc: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.
63.name: Brainstalks
63.quote: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.

65.desc: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.
65.name: Corpsebloom
65.quote: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.

66.desc: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
66.name: Gesture of the Drowned
66.quote: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.

67.desc: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.
67.name: Old Guillotine
67.quote: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.

68.desc: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).
68.name: War Horn
68.quote: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.

69.desc: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.
69.name: Aegis
69.quote: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.

7.desc: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.
7.name: Ceremonial Dagger
7.quote: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.

74.desc: Reduce ALL stats by -5% (-5% per stack).
74.name: Tonic Affliction
74.quote: Reduce ALL stats when not under the effects of Spinel Tonic.

75.desc: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.
75.name: Halcyon Seed
75.quote: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.

76.desc: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.
76.name: Little Disciple

77.desc: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).
77.name: Topaz Brooch
77.quote: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.

78.desc: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
78.name: Shattering Justice
78.quote: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.

79.desc: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.
79.name: Lepton Daisy
79.quote: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event and 'Holdout Zones' such as the Void Fields.

8.desc: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.
8.name: Monster Tooth
8.quote: Drop a healing orb on kill.

80.desc: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).
80.name: Focus Crystal
80.quote: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.

81.desc: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.\nFade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.
81.name: Strides of Heresy

83.desc: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius
83.name: Razorwire
83.quote: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.

84.desc: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).
84.name: Bison Steak

85.desc: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).
85.name: Pearl

86.desc: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).
86.name: Irradiant Pearl

87.desc: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.
87.name: Ghor's Tome
87.quote: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.

88.desc: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack)}], piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).
88.name: Resonance Disc
88.quote: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.

89.desc: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.\nFire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).
89.name: Visions of Heresy
89.quote: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.

9.desc: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
9.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
9.quote: Chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

90.desc: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .
90.name: Genesis Loop
90.quote: Fire an electric nova at low health.

92.desc: A stone shard with immense power.
92.name: Artifact Key
92.quote: A stone shard with immense power.

93.desc: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.
93.name: Repulsion Armor Plate
93.quote: Receive flat damage reduction from all attacks.

94.desc: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.
94.name: Squid Polyp
94.quote: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret nearby.

95.desc: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death}], increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.
95.name: Death Mark
95.quote: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, taking bonus damage.

96.desc: On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.\nThe plant heals for 10% of maximum health every second to all allies within 5m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.
96.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
96.quote: Plant a healing fruit on kill.

97.desc: 7% chance (+1% per stack) on kill to summon an Ancestral Pod that distracts enemies.\nOnce it fully grows, it will hatch into an allied Parent with 100% health (+100% per stack).
97.name: Ancestral Incubator
97.quote: Chance on kill to summon an Ancestral Pod.

98.desc: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster}], but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.
98.name: Focused Convergence
98.quote: Increase the speed of Teleporter charging... BUT reduce the size of the zone.

99.desc: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.
99.name: Molten Perforator
99.quote: Chance on hit to fire magma balls.

1.desc: A macabre, poison-spewing ex-prisoner, Acrid fights with a potent array of damage-over-time effects and self-sustaining melee ability.
1.name: Acrid

10.desc: A modified multi-purpose robot, MUL-T lives up to its designation through its sheer versatility. Slow but highly durable, it possesses the unique ability to select two of four primary weapons and utilize them in two different configurations.
10.name: MUL-T

11.desc: A highly mobile and maneuverable fighter, the Mercenary strikes swiftly and rapidly to devastate enemies, gaining both invincibility and mobility with his various attacks.
11.name: Mercenary

12.desc: REX is a half robot / half plant that uses HP to cast devastating skills from a distance. Their attacks are powerful and strike from a great distance, but in exchange, some require REX's health as a resource.
12.name: Rex

2.desc: Wielding a diverse armament of destructive skills, Artificer's strength lies in her devastating offense that can break through even the bulkiest of enemies.
2.name: Artificer

3.desc: A swift and sneaky fighter, the Bandit focuses on keeping on the move to catch enemies off guard and deal ruinous damage, before finishing the job with Lights Out.
3.name: Bandit

4.desc: Commander of the UES Safe Travels, the Captain's strength is his ability to call down a variety of tactical drops from orbit, from a humble healing beacon to the spectacularly haphazard OGM-72 'DIABLO' Strike.
4.name: Captain

5.desc: Unlocked by default, the Commando is intended as a well-rounded and easily understood character with no particular weaknesses or strengths, combining mobility and offense in his tactics.
5.name: Commando

6.desc: With an assortment of deployable gadgets, the Engineer's strength comes not from him alone, but rather his ability to set up a variety of defensive measures.
6.name: Engineer

7.desc: Heretic has extremely high base health, can triple jump, and has negative health regeneration, causing her to lose health over time instead of recovering it.
7.name: Heretic

8.desc: With powerful homing attacks and very high mobility, but very low health and somewhat limited range on many of her skills, the Huntress can be considered a "glass cannon" character.
8.name: Huntress

9.desc: An incredibly mobile and heavy cargo loader, the Loader is capable of delivering some of the hardest-hitting attacks in the game. When utilizing velocity to her advantage, she is able to topple many powerful monsters in just a single punch.
9.name: Loader
